thread.title: Give room service food a wide berth
thread.title_full: Give room service food a wide berth - Review of Mercure Paris Montparnasse Raspail, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pauline M
title: Give room service food a wide berth
text:
After a gruelling day of sightseeing we opted to eat in. The food was pur√©ed and served in microwave pots. We refused to pay for the offering as not as expected according to the limited menu. We were advised that the food was bought in and microwaved on site.
The hotel was lovely, the staff very obliging, room was smallish but very nicely decorated and to a high standard. Very comfortable and clean. Our room was next to lift and not too noisy.
